description: I've been programming websites for the last past 10 years mainly for the French newspaper industry (Le Parisien, Les Echos, ...) using #PHP and #Javascript.
#Music is a big part of my life. I started to study and play when I was 4 years old. 10 years ago I started #DJing for fun. You can subscribe to my #Podcast on iTunes.

I created a music website about #electronic #music 8 years ago. Music from my favourite artists and labels are automatically imported via Soundcloud, Beatport & Youtube APIs. The custom made back office I created allows me to quickly listen and select the best tracks and automatically publish them.
I like having fun and getting creative with electronic #gadgets. I'm big fan and expert of #Apple products.
2 years ago I spent one year traveling and exploring the world. Seeing all this places and meeting people fron different cultures was very open minding.
